channel.title: Compiler error Need helP!
channel.description:
Hii All if i compile the client it gave me those errors
client.java:486: error: ')' expected File Map = new File(".loc+"Data/Maps/"+Index+".gz"); ^ client.java:486: error: illegal start of expression File Map = new File(".loc+"Data/Maps/"+Index+".gz"); ^ client.java:486: error: ';' expected File Map = new File(".loc+"Data/Maps/"+Index+".gz"); ^ client.java:486: error: unclosed string literal File Map = new File(".loc+"Data/Maps/"+Index+".gz"); ^ client.java:486: error: not a statement File Map = new File(".loc+"Data/Maps/"+Index+".gz"); ^ 5 errors Press A Key to Continue. . .
Please can someone tell me what those errors are and how to fix?, maybe copy the errors and remake it so it works? i mean adding .,<>[] etc. or everything else
Thanks Greetings Ricardo

item.title: Compiler error Need helP!
item.dc:creator: @ricardoxkill ricardoxkill
item.description:
@ricardoxkill wrote:

Hii All if i compile the client it gave me those errors

client.java:486: error: ‘)’ expected
File Map = new File(".loc+“Data/Maps/”+Index+".gz");
^
client.java:486: error: illegal start of expression
File Map = new File(".loc+“Data/Maps/”+Index+".gz");
^
client.java:486: error: ‘;’ expected
File Map = new File(".loc+“Data/Maps/”+Index+".gz");
^
client.java:486: error: unclosed string literal
File Map = new File(".loc+“Data/Maps/”+Index+".gz");
^
client.java:486: error: not a statement
File Map = new File(".loc+“Data/Maps/”+Index+".gz");
^
5 errors
Press A Key to Continue. . .

Please can someone tell me what those errors are and how to fix?, maybe copy the errors and remake it so it works? i mean adding .,<>[] etc. or everything else

Thanks Greetings Ricardo
